Authorization.termsText:
1. General Provisions

These terms and conditions govern the use of the translation service ("Service") offered by Suliko LLC (hereinafter - "Company", "we"). By accessing or using the Service, you as a user ("User") agree to the terms of this document.

2. User Obligations

When using the Service, you are obligated to use it only for legal purposes and not violate applicable laws.

It is prohibited to use the Service to create, distribute, or transmit any harmful or illegal content.

3. Intellectual Property

You retain ownership of the text you upload to the Service. By using the Service, you grant the Company a limited, non-exclusive license to process and use this text solely for performing and improving the translation service.

The Service, all its components, software, design, and other materials constitute the intellectual property of the Company and are protected by copyright.

4. Limitation of Liability

The Service is provided "as is" without any warranty. The Company makes no guarantee that the Service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or secure.

The Company is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or other damages caused by the use of the Service.

5. Service Termination

The Company has the right to restrict or terminate user access to the Service at any time and for any reason if the user violates these terms and conditions.

6. Changes

The Company reserves the right to make changes to these terms and conditions at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon posting on the website or application.
Authorization.privacyText:
1. Information Collection

Information You Provide: We collect the text that you upload for using the translation service.

Technical and Usage Data: We may collect information about your device, IP address, browser type, and service usage (e.g., translation frequency, languages used) for analytics and service improvement.

2. Information Usage

Collected information is used for the following purposes:

To perform the translation service.

To improve the service and adapt it to your needs.

For analytics on how users use the service.

To resolve technical issues and ensure security.

3. Data Security

We employ reasonable administrative, technical, and physical measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of data transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

4. Your Rights

You have the right to request access to, correction, or deletion of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us.

5. Data Retention

We will retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.

Landing.title: Suliko Translation - Translate a document in 5 minutes.
Landing.description: Translator‚Äôs Assistant ‚Äì Upload your document and reduce translation time by up to 70%. Focus on the content, not the technical work.

VideoSection.title: See Suliko in Action
VideoSection.description: Watch how our AI-powered translation platform works and discover why professionals worldwide trust Suliko for their translation needs.

AboutSection.title: Why Choose Suliko?
AboutSection.missionText: Our mission is to make translation faster, more accurate, and accessible to everyone. Suliko combines artificial intelligence and translator expertise to make document translation a simple process ‚Äî a matter of minutes, not hours. We want professional translators and businesses to have a unified, intelligent tool that preserves text format, structure, and meaning accuracy in any language.

video.title: See Suliko in Action
video.description: Discover how Suliko works and why professionals worldwide choose it for their translation needs.

aiPowered.title: Translator's Copilot
aiPowered.description: Suliko empowers translators to earn 3-10x more by accelerating their workflow. We're not replacing translators‚Äîwe're their intelligent assistant.

security.title: Split-Screen Editing
security.description: Work with confidence using our split-screen proofreading interface. Compare original and translated content side-by-side for perfect translations.

speed.title: Smart Suggestions & Export
speed.description: Get intelligent suggestions to improve translation quality, then export your work in Word, PDF, or plain text formats with professional-grade results.

AboutSection.desktopDisclaimer: For the best user experience, we recommend using Suliko on desktop devices.

translationHouse.content: Suliko has transformed our translation workflow. The advanced accuracy combined with professional quality has helped us serve our clients better and faster. It's become an essential tool for our agency.

irakliVekua.name: ·Éò·É†·Éê·Éô·Éö·Éò ·Éï·Éî·Éô·É£·Éê
irakliVekua.content: For me, the experience of working with Suliko has been invaluable. Unlike ChatGPT and its analogues, the quality of document translation is outstanding, and the speed allows us to keep up with business opportunities quickly.

iuristi.name: Iuristi.ge Team
iuristi.content: Translating legal documents requires absolute precision. Suliko's accuracy in translating complex legal terminology and maintaining context is unrivaled.

nebulaAI.name: Nebula AI Hub
nebulaAI.content: When working with technology, we appreciate the sophistication of Suliko's translation engine. The quality and reliability have exceeded our expectations.

api24.name: API24
api24.content: When expanding on an international scale, localization was a critical challenge for API24. Suliko played a decisive role in adapting our interface and technical documentation. This allowed us to make our platform accessible to developers worldwide.

LandingFooter.description: The world's most advanced translation platform. Breaking down language barriers with precision, speed, and reliability.

hero.title: Translation API for Developers
hero.subtitle: Integrate powerful AI translation into your applications with just a few lines of code. Translate articles, on-site texts, and more in one click.

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: Get translations in milliseconds with our optimized API infrastructure

languages.title: Multiple Languages
languages.description: Support for dozens of languages with accurate AI-powered translation

security.title: Secure & Reliable
security.description: Enterprise-grade security with unique keys for each company

quickStart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickStart.description: Get up and running in minutes

step1.title: Step 1: Get Your API Key
step1.description: Contact us to receive your unique API key (uniqueKey) that identifies your company. This key is required for all API requests.

step2.title: Step 2: Get Available Languages
step2.description: Fetch the list of available languages and their IDs using our languages endpoint:

step3.title: Step 3: Translate Your Text
step3.description: Send your text for translation using our translation endpoint. Simply provide the text, target language ID, and your unique key.

api.title: API Documentation
api.description: Complete API reference for integrating translation into your applications

endpoint.title: Translation Endpoint
endpoint.method: HTTP POST request with JSON body

request.title: Request Body
request.description: Send your translation request with the following JSON structure:

fields.description: The text you want to translate (string, required)
fields.languageId: The ID of the target language (number, required). Get available language IDs from the /api/Language endpoint.
fields.uniqueKey: Your company's unique API key (string, required). Contact us to receive your uniqueKey.

response.title: Response
response.description: A successful response will return the translated text:

examples.title: Code Examples
examples.description: Ready-to-use code snippets in popular programming languages

languages.title: Available Languages
languages.description: Get the complete list of supported languages
languages.info: Use this endpoint to retrieve all available languages and their IDs:
languages.response: The response is an array of language objects with the following structure:

enhanceApi.title: Enhance Translation API
enhanceApi.description: Improve and refine existing translations with AI-powered enhancement

endpoint.title: Enhance Translation Endpoint
endpoint.method: HTTP POST request with JSON body

request.title: Request Body
request.description: Send your enhancement request with the following JSON structure:

fields.userInput: The original text that was translated (string, required)
fields.translateOutput: The translated text that needs enhancement (string, required)
fields.targetLanguageId: The ID of the target language (number, required). Get available language IDs from the /api/Language endpoint.
fields.uniqueKey: Your company's unique API key (string, required). Contact us to receive your uniqueKey.

response.title: Response
response.description: A successful response will return the enhanced translation:

examples.title: Enhance Translation Code Examples
examples.description: Code snippets for enhancing translations in popular programming languages

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Contact us today to receive your unique API key and start translating content in seconds

mobileOverlay.title: Best viewed on desktop
mobileOverlay.mobileOverlayText: This website is designed for the desktop experience. For full functionality and the best experience please visit from a PC or larger screen.
